reviews.review: Um jogo muito bacana, muito bom para jogar com os amigos.
If you're better at hiding than shooting... this game is for you.

This is a great game concept I've had alot of fun I had over 1000 hours on my other account but this game is just plagued by dumb devs the newest patch notes prove that do me a favor go on steam charts and look where it starts degressing in late 2021 that's where mmr was introduced and the community stands pretty united in agreement that it's just not fun and the devs nerf killer every update I used to main and love killer but playing killer in 2022 is stressful and irritating most high mmr have hit the skill ceiling and devs keep buffing survivors with stuff like boon healing and boil over and all this does is alienate killers further and further if I started DBD in 2022 I would have dropped it instantly Devs need to make a comp and a casual mode, bring back a rank system, maybe nerf survivors a little?, start adding killers that don't just throw or run fast make them unique like nurse, and so much more this is a game that has only gone downhill and man I want to see this game succeed I wanna see that so bad it makes me so sad to see update after update in the wrong direction but theres nothing we can do thanks for reading -Rip Hawkins

Skill based matchmaking is a joke. Red rank survivors when the killer just starting playing the game, and red rank kilers when the survivor is trying to learn the game. 
Behaviour also hates their players by not listening to the community. 
So fun.
Na verdade nÃ£o recomendo muito esse jogo nÃ£o, mas atÃ© que Ã© legal
Its the most fun when you have friends who play it with you :,>

its a good game but the killer have the advantage 99.99%  and its not fun anymore i say i will quit and i will one day when i am sick of them winning all the time and i dont think they will change the game in any update it will never be balanced between killer and survivor

Killer camping hook = High sodium intake.
10 / 10, would juke salty ghost face again.

The developers preference towards the Survivor side of the game severely impacts its status of a asymmetrical 4v1 hunter vs hunted gaming scenario. The genre is rare in itself but it has improved a lot since the near end of 2021. It has removed a lot of overpowered items and is probably now in its best state. I recommend this game because it has a genre you wont experience anywhere else.

You would find much more enjoyment watching a streamer/youtuber/etc. play this game rather than yourself due to the ridiculous grind. I was going to go into detail about the grind, but I just can't bother anymore, which is the same thing I will say about this game.

No incentive for new players and once initial fun period stops, if it stops, you're left with barely any perks. Speaking of perks you better be running meta perks because everyone else will and just leave you in the dust.
They've made matchmaking more arbitrary than it was before and there's now invisible MMR.

It's not fun anymore, the grind feels like hell, and the amount of DLC's are beating Paradox Interactive and some day will match Sims 4.
